00043 #include "lib/bp_lib/types.hh"
00044 #include "lib/bp_lib/intmath.hh"
00045 #include "tournament.hh"
00046 #include <cassert>
00047 #include <stdio.h>
00048 
00049 TournamentBP::TournamentBP(unsigned _localPredictorSize,
00050                            unsigned _localCtrBits,
00051                            unsigned _localHistoryTableSize,
00052                            unsigned _localHistoryBits,
00053                            unsigned _globalPredictorSize,
00054                            unsigned _globalHistoryBits,
00055                            unsigned _globalCtrBits,
00056                            unsigned _choicePredictorSize,
00057                            unsigned _choiceCtrBits,
00058                            unsigned _instShiftAmt)
00059     : localPredictorSize(_localPredictorSize),
00060       localCtrBits(_localCtrBits),
00061       localHistoryTableSize(_localHistoryTableSize),
00062       localHistoryBits(_localHistoryBits),
00063       globalPredictorSize(_globalPredictorSize),
00064       globalCtrBits(_globalCtrBits),
00065       globalHistoryBits(_globalHistoryBits),
00066       choicePredictorSize(_globalPredictorSize),
00067       choiceCtrBits(_choiceCtrBits),
00068       instShiftAmt(_instShiftAmt)
00069 {
00070     if (!isPowerOf2(localPredictorSize)) {
00071         std::cerr << "Invalid local predictor size!\n";
00072     }
00073 
00074     //Setup the array of counters for the local predictor
00075     localCtrs.resize(localPredictorSize);
00076 
00077     for (unsigned i = 0; i < localPredictorSize; ++i)
00078         localCtrs[i].setBits(localCtrBits);
00079 
00080     localPredictorMask = floorPow2(localPredictorSize) - 1;
00081 
00082     if (!isPowerOf2(localHistoryTableSize)) {
00083         std::cerr << "Invalid local history table size!\n";
00084     }
00085 
00086     //Setup the history table for the local table
00087     localHistoryTable.resize(localHistoryTableSize);
00088 
00089     for (unsigned i = 0; i < localHistoryTableSize; ++i)
00090         localHistoryTable[i] = 0;
00091 
00092     // Setup the local history mask
00093     localHistoryMask = (1 << localHistoryBits) - 1;
00094 
00095     if (!isPowerOf2(globalPredictorSize)) {
00096         std::cerr << "Invalid global predictor size!\n";
00097     }
00098 
00099     //Setup the array of counters for the global predictor
00100     globalCtrs.resize(globalPredictorSize);
00101 
00102     for (unsigned i = 0; i < globalPredictorSize; ++i)
00103         globalCtrs[i].setBits(globalCtrBits);
00104 
00105     //Clear the global history
00106     globalHistory = 0;
00107     // Setup the global history mask
00108     globalHistoryMask = (1 << globalHistoryBits) - 1;
00109 
00110     if (!isPowerOf2(choicePredictorSize)) {
00111         std::cerr << "Invalid choice predictor size!\n";
00112     }
00113 
00114     //Setup the array of counters for the choice predictor
00115     choiceCtrs.resize(choicePredictorSize);
00116 
00117     for (unsigned i = 0; i < choicePredictorSize; ++i)
00118         choiceCtrs[i].setBits(choiceCtrBits);
00119 
00120     // @todo: Allow for different thresholds between the predictors.
00121     threshold = (1 << (localCtrBits - 1)) - 1;
00122 }
00123 
00124 inline
00125 unsigned
00126 TournamentBP::calcLocHistIdx(uint64_t &branch_addr)
00127 {
00128     // Get low order bits after removing instruction offset.
00129     return (branch_addr >> instShiftAmt) & (localHistoryTableSize - 1);
00130 }
00131 
00132 inline
00133 void
00134 TournamentBP::updateGlobalHistTaken()
00135 {
00136     globalHistory = (globalHistory << 1) | 1;
00137     globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline
00141 void
00142 TournamentBP::updateGlobalHistNotTaken()
00143 {
00144     globalHistory = (globalHistory << 1);
00145     globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00146 }
00147 
00148 inline
00149 void
00150 TournamentBP::updateLocalHistTaken(unsigned local_history_idx)
00151 {
00152     localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] =
00153         (localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] << 1) | 1;
00154 }
00155 
00156 inline
00157 void
00158 TournamentBP::updateLocalHistNotTaken(unsigned local_history_idx)
00159 {
00160     localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] =
00161         (localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] << 1);
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 void
00166 TournamentBP::BTBUpdate(uint64_t &branch_addr, void * &bp_history)
00167 {
00168     unsigned local_history_idx = calcLocHistIdx(branch_addr);
00169     //Update Global History to Not Taken
00170     globalHistory = globalHistory & (globalHistoryMask - 1);
00171     //Update Local History to Not Taken
00172     localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] =
00173        localHistoryTable[local_history_idx] & (localPredictorMask - 1);
00174 }
00175 
00176 bool
00177 TournamentBP::lookup(uint64_t &branch_addr, void * &bp_history)
00178 {
00179     bool local_prediction;
00180     unsigned local_history_idx;
00181     unsigned local_predictor_idx;
00182 
00183     bool global_prediction;
00184     bool choice_prediction;
00185 
00186     //Lookup in the local predictor to get its branch prediction
00187     local_history_idx = calcLocHistIdx(branch_addr);
00188     local_predictor_idx = localHistoryTable[local_history_idx]
00189         & localPredictorMask;
00190     local_prediction = localCtrs[local_predictor_idx].read() > threshold;
00191 
00192     //Lookup in the global predictor to get its branch prediction
00193     global_prediction = globalCtrs[globalHistory].read() > threshold;
00194 
00195     //Lookup in the choice predictor to see which one to use
00196     choice_prediction = choiceCtrs[globalHistory].read() > threshold;
00197 
00198     // Create BPHistory and pass it back to be recorded.
00199     BPHistory *history = new BPHistory;
00200     history->globalHistory = globalHistory;
00201     history->localPredTaken = local_prediction;
00202     history->globalPredTaken = global_prediction;
00203     history->globalUsed = choice_prediction;
00204     history->localHistory = local_predictor_idx;
00205     bp_history = (void *)history;
00206 
00207     assert(globalHistory < globalPredictorSize &&
00208            local_history_idx < localHistoryTableSize &&
00209            local_predictor_idx < localPredictorSize);
00210 
00211     // Commented code is for doing speculative update of counters and
00212     // all histories.
00213     if (choice_prediction) {
00214         if (global_prediction) {
00215             updateGlobalHistTaken();
00216             updateLocalHistTaken(local_history_idx);
00217             return true;
00218         } else {
00219             updateGlobalHistNotTaken();
00220             updateLocalHistNotTaken(local_history_idx);
00221             return false;
00222         }
00223     } else {
00224         if (local_prediction) {
00225             updateGlobalHistTaken();
00226             updateLocalHistTaken(local_history_idx);
00227             return true;
00228         } else {
00229             updateGlobalHistNotTaken();
00230             updateLocalHistNotTaken(local_history_idx);
00231             return false;
00232         }
00233     }
00234 }
00235 
00236 void
00237 TournamentBP::uncondBr(void * &bp_history)
00238 {
00239     // Create BPHistory and pass it back to be recorded.
00240     BPHistory *history = new BPHistory;
00241     history->globalHistory = globalHistory;
00242     history->localPredTaken = true;
00243     history->globalPredTaken = true;
00244     history->globalUsed = true;
00245     history->localHistory = invalidPredictorIndex;
00246     bp_history = static_cast<void *>(history);
00247 
00248     updateGlobalHistTaken();
00249 }
00250 
00251 void
00252 TournamentBP::update(uint64_t &branch_addr, bool taken, void *bp_history,
00253                      bool squashed)
00254 {
00255     unsigned local_history_idx;
00256     unsigned local_predictor_idx __attribute__((unused));
00257     unsigned local_predictor_hist;
00258 
00259     // Get the local predictor's current prediction
00260     local_history_idx = calcLocHistIdx(branch_addr);
00261     local_predictor_hist = localHistoryTable[local_history_idx];
00262     local_predictor_idx = local_predictor_hist & localPredictorMask;
00263     if (bp_history) {
00264         BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00265         // Update may also be called if the Branch target is incorrect even if
00266         // the prediction is correct. In that case do not update the counters.
00267         bool historyPred = false;
00268         unsigned old_local_pred_index = history->localHistory
00269                       & localPredictorMask;
00270         if (history->globalUsed) {
00271            historyPred = history->globalPredTaken;
00272         } else {
00273            historyPred = history->localPredTaken;
00274         }
00275         if (historyPred != taken || !squashed) {
00276             // Update the choice predictor to tell it which one was correct if
00277             // there was a prediction.
00278             if (history->localPredTaken != history->globalPredTaken) {
00279                  // If the local prediction matches the actual outcome,
00280                  // decerement the counter.  Otherwise increment the
00281                  // counter.
00282                  if (history->localPredTaken == taken) {
00283                      choiceCtrs[history->globalHistory].decrement();
00284                  } else if (history->globalPredTaken == taken) {
00285                      choiceCtrs[history->globalHistory].increment();
00286                  }
00287 
00288              }
00289 
00290              // Update the counters and local history with the proper
00291              // resolution of the branch.  Global history is updated
00292              // speculatively and restored upon squash() calls, so it does not
00293              // need to be updated.
00294              if (taken) {
00295                   globalCtrs[history->globalHistory].increment();
00296                   if (old_local_pred_index != (unsigned)invalidPredictorIndex) {
00297                           localCtrs[old_local_pred_index].increment();
00298                   }
00299              } else {
00300                   globalCtrs[history->globalHistory].decrement();
00301                   if (old_local_pred_index != (unsigned)invalidPredictorIndex) {
00302                           localCtrs[old_local_pred_index].decrement();
00303                   }
00304              }
00305         }
00306         if (squashed) {
00307              if (taken) {
00308                 globalHistory = (history->globalHistory << 1) | 1;
00309                 globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00310                 if (old_local_pred_index != (unsigned)invalidPredictorIndex) {
00311                     localHistoryTable[old_local_pred_index] =
00312                      (history->localHistory << 1) | 1;
00313                 }
00314              } else {
00315                 globalHistory = (history->globalHistory << 1);
00316                 globalHistory = globalHistory & globalHistoryMask;
00317                 if (old_local_pred_index != (unsigned)invalidPredictorIndex) {
00318                      localHistoryTable[old_local_pred_index] =
00319                      history->localHistory << 1;
00320                 }
00321              }
00322         }
00323         // We're done with this history, now delete it.
00324         delete history;
00325 
00326     }
00327 
00328     assert(globalHistory < globalPredictorSize &&
00329            local_history_idx < localHistoryTableSize &&
00330            local_predictor_idx < localPredictorSize);
00331 
00332 
00333 }
00334 
00335 void
00336 TournamentBP::squash(void *bp_history)
00337 {
00338     BPHistory *history = static_cast<BPHistory *>(bp_history);
00339 
00340     // Restore global history to state prior to this branch.
00341     globalHistory = history->globalHistory;
00342 
00343     // Delete this BPHistory now that we're done with it.
00344     delete history;
00345 }

00348 int
00349 TournamentBP::BPHistory::newCount = 0;
00350 #endif
